projects.name: AI Coding tutor
projects.summary: Created a code learning site using react and consuming code excution api and steamship GPT4 api.

Integrated Steamship API to check the validity of the submitted answers using AI models.
Embeded AI powered chat bot to help users tackle the problem by providing hints on how to solve it.
